## ModelManager.update() method

更新导致渲染

**Signature:**

```typescript
update(model: Model, key: string, oldValue?: unknown, newValue?: unknown): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  model | [Model](./nodom3.model.md) | model |
|  key | string | 属性 |
|  oldValue | unknown | _(Optional)_ 旧值 |
|  newValue | unknown | _(Optional)_ 新值 |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

如果不设置oldValue和newValue，则直接强制渲染
